He ____ on ____ win ____ largest ____ majority ____ a ____ of ____ in ____ political ____ at ____ subsequent ____. After two further election victories in 1977 and 1980, he was defeated by the Bob Hawke-led Australian Labor Party in 1983 and left parliament shortly after.

After two further election victories in 1977 and 1980, he was defeated by the Bob Hawke-led Australian Labor Party in 1983 and left parliament shortly after.
data.fullContent: Fraser was appointed as caretaker prime minister on 11 November 1975 by the Governor-General of Australia, Sir John Kerr, following the controversial dismissal of the Whitlam Government in which he played a key role. He went on to win the largest parliamentary majority as a proportion of seats in Australian political history at the subsequent election. After two further election victories in 1977 and 1980, he was defeated by the Bob Hawke-led Australian Labor Party in 1983 and left parliament shortly after.
data.answer: 1975年11月11日，弗雷泽被澳大利亚总督约翰·科尔爵士任命为看守总理，在此之前，他在惠特拉姆政府中扮演了关键角色，引起了争议。在随后的选举中，他赢得了澳大利亚政治史上最大的议会多数席位。在1977年和1980年的两次选举胜利后，他在1983年被鲍勃•霍克领导的澳大利亚工党击败，不久后就离开了议会。
